channel.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
channel.description:
From july 2002
[code][16:17] <mrandrew> hello [16:17] <mrandrew> I've adjusted some setting on the NY servers, they might be less laggy now [16:18] <mrandrew> the database is also on a kickass dual-xeon machine :-) which has solved the other problems I think
[16:18] <Fudgy999> cool, any idea how long till nxt update? [16:18] <mrandrew> well paul stayed behind on holiday so I'll do the next content update when he gets back on monday [16:19] <mrandrew> might be tuesday depending if it needs much testing [16:19] = Sausageeater gets excited that monkeys might feature in the jungle area :-) [16:20] <mrandrew> the jungle won't have monkeys initially, but they are on our artists list of things to do
[16:20] <Fudgy999> Hey andrew, could you giv us a breif on wot the 'battle feild' will actually be? [16:20] <Tseng_V_V> hey the jungle only for members? [16:20] <mrandrew> the battlefield is just an area of map, it's a bit training area with 2 armies, so lots of stuff to fight [16:21] <Fudgy999> are the 2 armies npc? [16:21] <mrandrew> and it has nice battle scenery, like discarded weapons and spear walls, and various fortifications [16:21] <mrandrew> it's part of one of the new quests as well yes [16:21] <mrandrew> yes npc [16:21] <Tseng_V_V> for members? [16:21] <mrandrew> yep it's 4 members [16:21] <Fudgy999> and the npcs will attack eachother? that would be call [16:21] <Fudgy999> cool* [16:21] <Tony> Cool, the 411 straight from Andrew [16:22] <das1330> how about the treetop village? [16:22] <mrandrew> the engine doesn't allow us to make npcs fight each other at the moment, although I'd love to add that in
[16:22] <mrandrew> the treetop village I'm very impressed with because I didn't think it was possible and then one of our guys went and did it! [16:22] <XxATTICxX> Andrew cna you answer a question i knwo alot of ppl needa know [16:22] <Fudgy999> npc battle , and players pick a side and join in! [16:22] <Tseng_V_V> there should be a place that you have to teleport to to get to [16:22] <XxATTICxX> Why do we pay more with a check
[16:23] <mrandrew> if you buy 12 months it's the same price, it you buy 6 or 2 it slightly more because the agency paybycash adds their own charge on top for handling the payment [16:23] <Tseng_V_V> hey andrew are there any new things for the free version ever coming up? [16:23] <mrandrew> yes, new graphics [16:23] <XxATTICxX> andrew will free be gettin those new models too? [16:23] <mrandrew> yes
[16:24] <XxATTICxX> you will be 5 bucks richer next week lol
[16:24] <Tseng_V_V> cause ive done all the quests so its kinda boring having everything the same
[16:24] <mrandrew> once I'm happy the rs problem is fixed the new graphics is the next thing on my list [16:25] <XxATTICxX> andrew the 22nd is that big update right?
[16:25] <mrandrew> will be 22nd or 23rd I expect [16:25] <mrandrew> I tried playing RS over my mobile phone and laptop on holiday [16:26] <mrandrew> amazingly it worked, a bit expensive tho! [16:26] <mrandrew> in game I'm called Andrew [16:26] <MattX> Andrew, what are the holidays when party hats are dropped? [16:26] <mrandrew> but I tend to hide in quiet bits of the map to avoid getting mobbed [16:26] <Tks> Any new skills in the near future? [16:26] <mrandrew> party hats are christmas
[16:27] <MattX> Yeah that bug that lets u walk in void space from falador outside of the walls at varrock museum [16:27] <mrandrew> another void space bug? [16:27] <XxATTICxX> tahst it theres also one in falador castle [16:27] <XxATTICxX> whirte knights one [16:27] <mrandrew> ok I will get paul to fix it when he gets back from holiday [16:28] <Tseng_V_V> in falador castle you can climb up ladders to tell peoples levels [16:28] <mrandrew> hmm nope godlys bank is empty [16:29] <Fudgy999> andrew, jagex cam is pointing to the ceiling! [16:30] <mrandrew> hmm yep the jagex.com computer got turned into a linux box [16:30] <mrandrew> I need to setup a replacement [16:30] <mrandrew> jagex cam I mean [16:31] <mrandrew> but the jagex ceiling is very nice :-=) [16:32] <mrandrew> not many people know about the cam [16:33] <mrandrew> lol, I don't mind, although mrnorris doesn't have much bandwidth :-) [16:33] <mrandrew> can anyone here tell me if the NY servers seem better today? [16:33] <MattX> yeah sure hold on andrew [16:33] <Tks> ill try it out, they are next door to me [16:33] <Tony> New York servers always lag hard Andrew [16:33] <mrandrew> I adjust the network card to run in full-duplex, which it should have been in anyway, but apparently wasn't [16:33] <Tony> And I live in Queens NY [16:33] <pork> yea i live in MAss [16:33] <Fudgy999> no-one on server 12 [16:33] <pork> and use UK servers [16:34] <mrandrew> try it now tony :-) [16:34] <mrandrew> 12 is offline [16:34] <das1330> so andrew will we get fear back maybe? and maybe a teleport to that a town [16:34] <Thunder> i only use uk ones:) [16:34] <Tks> hey, it actually does work! nice job [16:35] <Sausageeater> Andrew is there anything you can do about clint eastwood, hes lagging me into a coma? [16:35] <Fudgy999> i take that bak, quite a bit laggy for me [16:35] <Tony> I think my ISP is giving me bad lag too [16:35] <Tks> its great for me [16:35] <mrandrew> coo [16:36] <Tony> New York is doin better then Philly servers [16:36] <Tks> got about a one second lag for options menu, but stll a vast improvement [16:37] <mrandrew> ok thats good news [16:48] <mrandrew> well I'm off now, thanks for testing ny server for me [16:49] <mrandrew> bye [16:49] ::: [signoff] mrandrew (Quit:)[/code]

item.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
item.dc:creator: @Fudgy999 Fudgy999
item.description:
@Fudgy999 wrote:

So I came across this thread in a moment of complete boredom and deciding to Google my old Runescape name. Can’t believe that was 13 years ago… I remember playing Runescape back when there was only a single server and 2 towns. Would regularly talk to Andrew and Paul ingame and on IRC. I haven’t played it in years and eventually gave the account to my brother. Still; Interesting to see that it’s still so popular after all this time.

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower

item.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Here are some logs from '01

<MrAndrew> redhat 7.1 - that's whats wrong with rs <MrAndrew> e.g it's crap

<Von-Neumann> Andrew can you refund all the hours spent on runescape please :) <MrAndrew> but I didn't charge you anything? <MrAndrew> I didn't MAKE you play :-) <MrAndrew> so no, bog off

*** MrAndrew changes topic to 'The shake thing does NOT freeze the client, or cause the lag. So shut it!' <MrAndrew> I made the shaking less annoying after talking in here last night <MrAndrew> it now only shakes, it doesn't rotate, which is much less dizzifying

<MrAndrew> it's funny <MrAndrew> cos you're saying pking is too hard <MrAndrew> and yet the vast majority of the players <MrAndrew> don't dare go out there for fear of dieing!

<MrAndrew> I wouldn't have added it, but it's the usual case of people trying to cheat forcing me to waste time on features which inconveniance everyone else <MrAndrew> the cheating is just ridculous!

[00:16] <Asrock> andrew: are people that have been locked up for macroing locked up forever? [00:16] <@MrAndrew> pretty much yes asrock, I do NOT like macroing [00:16] <@MrAndrew> it's blatantly obvious when people macro [00:17] <@MrAndrew> people report macroers to me and I login and go and have a look [00:17] <@MrAndrew> well the people who hate the game just shouldn't play it! stands to reason

[23:40] <@MrAndrew> had a record number of players this evening :-) I was very pleased [23:41] <@MrAndrew> I saw 3067 at once! [23:41] <Kerrick> i remember when we hit 1000 [23:41] <@MrAndrew> yep me too, I was so excited when we hit 1000 months ago [23:41] <@MrAndrew> now 1000 seems like hardly any

too long for post: http://paste.ee/p/nu8kG

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:6, topic:547599”][quote author=cleako link=topic=666507.msg4456207#msg4456207 date=1415060372]
So NPC vs NPC combat was never done with the game engine. Time to change that.
[/quote]
RoA did it already : p

Also noticed that andrew gower was playing runescape on his cellphone in 2002. Yet we can’t
in 2014, damn. Will someone message andrew on his twitter and tell him to come back and start a server[/quote]

Rock of Ages? I want to see! I want NPC vs NPC combat in order to allow rabid zombies to spread their virus across players and other NPCs, similar to that WoW virus that was introduced by a bug as well as set up NPCs with cannons that fire on zombies that approach too closely to the town walls. May end up finding other ways to still make this work.

Mapu worked on RoA. He is reachable on Twitter…

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:9, topic:547599”][quote author=nacional link=topic=666507.msg4456384#msg4456384 date=1415139798]
Will someone message andrew on his twitter and tell him to come back and start a server
[/quote]

Quote from Andrews website

[quote]Top secret game

We also have another (currently top secret) game in development. Our second game will be much larger. We aren’t ready to reveal much more about this yet, so check out the News and Updates section below to choose the most convenient way to keep informed.[/quote]

Since solstrike was similar to cyber wars, maybe this “top secret game” will be similar to RSC.[/quote]

Was solstrike or cyberwas the game they were suppose to have been working on forever ago? It was in space or something like that. It would be kind of cool to play another game from the guy. Does he still work with his brother?

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower

item.source: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower

item.title: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

From july 2002

[code][16:17] hello
[16:17] I’ve adjusted some setting on the NY servers, they might be less laggy now
[16:18] the database is also on a kickass dual-xeon machine which has solved the other problems I think

[16:18] cool, any idea how long till nxt update?
[16:18] well paul stayed behind on holiday so I’ll do the next content update when he gets back on monday
[16:19] might be tuesday depending if it needs much testing
[16:19] = Sausageeater gets excited that monkeys might feature in the jungle area
[16:20] the jungle won’t have monkeys initially, but they are on our artists list of things to do

[16:20] Hey andrew, could you giv us a breif on wot the ‘battle feild’ will actually be?
[16:20] <Tseng_V_V> hey the jungle only for members?
[16:20] the battlefield is just an area of map, it’s a bit training area with 2 armies, so lots of stuff to fight
[16:21] are the 2 armies npc?
[16:21] and it has nice battle scenery, like discarded weapons and spear walls, and various fortifications
[16:21] it’s part of one of the new quests as well yes
[16:21] yes npc
[16:21] <Tseng_V_V> for members?
[16:21] yep it’s 4 members
[16:21] and the npcs will attack eachother? that would be call
[16:21] cool*
[16:21] Cool, the 411 straight from Andrew
[16:22] how about the treetop village?
[16:22] the engine doesn’t allow us to make npcs fight each other at the moment, although I’d love to add that in

[16:22] the treetop village I’m very impressed with because I didn’t think it was possible and then one of our guys went and did it!
[16:22] Andrew cna you answer a question i knwo alot of ppl needa know
[16:22] npc battle , and players pick a side and join in!
[16:22] <Tseng_V_V> there should be a place that you have to teleport to to get to
[16:22] Why do we pay more with a check

[16:23] if you buy 12 months it’s the same price, it you buy 6 or 2 it slightly more because the agency paybycash adds their own charge on top for handling the payment
[16:23] <Tseng_V_V> hey andrew are there any new things for the free version ever coming up?
[16:23] yes, new graphics
[16:23] andrew will free be gettin those new models too?
[16:23] yes

[16:24] you will be 5 bucks richer next week lol

[16:24] <Tseng_V_V> cause ive done all the quests so its kinda boring having everything the same

[16:24] once I’m happy the rs problem is fixed the new graphics is the next thing on my list
[16:25] andrew the 22nd is that big update right?

[16:25] will be 22nd or 23rd I expect
[16:25] I tried playing RS over my mobile phone and laptop on holiday
[16:26] amazingly it worked, a bit expensive tho!
[16:26] in game I’m called Andrew
[16:26] Andrew, what are the holidays when party hats are dropped?
[16:26] but I tend to hide in quiet bits of the map to avoid getting mobbed
[16:26] Any new skills in the near future?
[16:26] party hats are christmas

[16:27] Yeah that bug that lets u walk in void space from falador outside of the walls at varrock museum
[16:27] another void space bug?
[16:27] tahst it theres also one in falador castle
[16:27] whirte knights one
[16:27] ok I will get paul to fix it when he gets back from holiday
[16:28] <Tseng_V_V> in falador castle you can climb up ladders to tell peoples levels
[16:28] hmm nope godlys bank is empty
[16:29] andrew, jagex cam is pointing to the ceiling!
[16:30] hmm yep the jagex.com computer got turned into a linux box
[16:30] I need to setup a replacement
[16:30] jagex cam I mean
[16:31] but the jagex ceiling is very nice :-=)
[16:32] not many people know about the cam
[16:33] lol, I don’t mind, although mrnorris doesn’t have much bandwidth
[16:33] can anyone here tell me if the NY servers seem better today?
[16:33] yeah sure hold on andrew
[16:33] ill try it out, they are next door to me
[16:33] New York servers always lag hard Andrew
[16:33] I adjust the network card to run in full-duplex, which it should have been in anyway, but apparently wasn’t
[16:33] And I live in Queens NY
[16:33] yea i live in MAss
[16:33] no-one on server 12
[16:33] and use UK servers
[16:34] try it now tony
[16:34] 12 is offline
[16:34] so andrew will we get fear back maybe? and maybe a teleport to that a town
[16:34] i only use uk ones:)
[16:34] hey, it actually does work! nice job
[16:35] Andrew is there anything you can do about clint eastwood, hes lagging me into a coma?
[16:35] i take that bak, quite a bit laggy for me
[16:35] I think my ISP is giving me bad lag too
[16:35] its great for me
[16:35] coo
[16:36] New York is doin better then Philly servers
[16:36] got about a one second lag for options menu, but stll a vast improvement
[16:37] ok thats good news
[16:48] well I’m off now, thanks for testing ny server for me
[16:49] bye
[16:49] ::: [signoff] mrandrew (Quit:)[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient IRC log with Andrew Gower
